headers.subject: [tosdr:2818] Yelp [bad]: Yelp claims irrevocable right to users content and all derivatives

html:
In the Yelp TOS pt.5.B the user grants Yelp "irrevocably grant (..) world-wide, perpetual, non-exclusive, royalty-free, assignable, sublicensable, transferable rights to use (thr users) Content for any purpose".

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Yelp [bad]: Yelp claims irrevocable right to users content and all derivatives
text:
In the Yelp TOS <http://www.yelp.com/static?p=tos&country=US> pt.5.B the 
user grants Yelp "irrevocably grant (..) world-wide, perpetual, 
non-exclusive, royalty-free, assignable, sublicensable, transferable rights 
to use (thr users) Content for any purpose".

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
